greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of solutions to +- 1^2 +- 3^2 +- 5^2 +- 7^2 +- ... +- (4*n-1)^2 = 0.
link: Seiichi Manyama, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..100
formula: Constant term in the expansion of Product_{k=1..2*n} (x^(2*k-1)^2+1/x^(2*k-1)^2).
results.author: _Seiichi Manyama_, Sep 17 2017
